title: Restore Version 12 configuration with automatic unique ID generation

requirements.text: Restore the application to Version 12 configuration while preserving the full users list display functionality

quotes: i required version 12, with all users list visible required

acceptanceCriteria: Users list remains fully visible and functional
All users are displayed in the users table

requirements.text: Implement automatic unique identity generation for each user to ensure every user has a distinct ID

quotes: each each id different make identity automatically

acceptanceCriteria: Each user automatically receives a unique identifier upon creation
No duplicate IDs exist in the system
ID generation happens automatically without manual input
Unique IDs are visible in the users list display

constraints: Do not modify any functionality beyond Version 12 restoration and automatic ID generation
Preserve the users list visibility feature
Maintain existing data structures and schemas
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond Version 12 scope
